DATA.APPEND_TEXT: Cool cardboard box! Hey, what's your name?

DATA.TEXT: Okay! So, uh, I'm Hugo! I, I was just wondering... May I go with you?
My dad doesn't let me out a lot, you know, because of the war! But today that everyone quit fighting...
Well, I thought it could be fun to go out to explore! So, uh, yeah, may I go with you?
Thanks, little dude!! You pinky-promise you won't tell dad, right?
Cool! Alright, space, here we go!!
